wiki_description:
"Let’s do our very, very, veeeery best!"
―Hanasato Minori 

Hanasato Minori (花里みのり) is a first-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's part of the idol group "MORE MORE JUMP!"

Minori is a big fan of Kiritani Haruka of the idol group ASRUN. Like her longtime idol, Minori also wants to become an idol. She tried her hand at multiple auditions but has failed every time. Despite this, she never gives up and continues to try to achieve her dreams. She is a hard-working and innocent-minded girl although she is bad at staying calm.
personality_type: ENFP - 7w6 - sx/so - 729 - IEE - SCOAI - EVLF - Sanguine [Dominant] - EN(F)

Hanasato Minori (花里みのり) is a first-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's part of the idol group "MORE MORE JUMP!"

Minori is a big fan of Kiritani Haruka of the idol group ASRUN. Like her longtime idol, Minori also wants to become an idol. She tried her hand at multiple auditions but has failed every time. Despite this, she never gives up and continues to try to achieve her dreams. She is a hard-working and innocent-minded girl although she is bad at staying calm.

related_topics.description:
"Do you really think that you can become an idol just like that!?"
―Momoi Airi

Momoi Airi (桃井愛莉) is a second-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's part of the idol group "MORE MORE JUMP!"

Airi is strong-minded and comes across as pushy to some. According to Minori, she's strict but reliable.

"This world isn’t one where you can treat life as one big picnic."
―Shinonome Akito

Shinonome Akito (東雲彰人) is a first-year student at Kamiyama High School. He's part of the street music group "Vivid BAD SQUAD."

Akito has been a street musician since middle school. He looks up to An Shiraishi's father, who was a street musician as well.

Akito appears to be an easy-going guy at first. However, his personality drastically changes when he's dancing, becoming a hot-blooded and passionate person.

Shinonome Ena is his older sister. Ena doesn't seem to pay attention to him at all, because she is always so focused on chatting online and never talks about him to her online friends. However, Akito is always there for her and he often talks about her to other people. Despite attending the same school, Ena only attends the night class in comparison to Akito who attends the normal day class.

"I welcome anything as long as it’s cute ♪"
 ― Akiyama Mizuki

Akiyama Mizuki (暁山瑞希) is a first-year student at Kamiyama High School. They're the animator of the underground music circle 25-ji, Night Chord de going by the alias "Amia".

Mizuki is a moody person and Kanade thinks they only act on their own principles. They tend to get frustrated and upset whenever they're ridiculed for various reasons, and they strongly desire to freely express themselves, without holding back or being made fun of due to just being who they are. They're also obsessed with cute things.

As of current, Mizuki’s gender identity is hidden from the player.
When referring to themselves, Mizuki uses the typically masculine first-person pronoun “Boku” (ボク).

"How nice it must be, for you to have music to call your own…"
―Asahina Mafuyu

Asahina Mafuyu (朝比奈まふゆ) is a second-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's the lyricist of the underground music circle 25-ji, Night Chord de going by the alias "Yuki".

Mafuyu appears to be bright and humorous. Many people rely on her. However not all is what it seems.

"Now then, let us put on the most magnificent of shows!"
―Kamishiro Rui

Kamishiro Rui (神代類) is a second-year student at Kamiyama High School. He's part of the musical show unit "Wonderlands x Showtime."

Rui lives by his own set of rules, which causes people to consider him a weirdo. He is also very skilled in inventing things and creates robots for the shows.

"…I must write more songs…"
―Yoisaki Kanade

Yoisaki Kanade (宵崎奏) is a home-schooled student. She's the composer of the underground music circle 25-ji, Night Code de. going by the alias K.

Kanade appears to be very accepting and sympathetic towards her fellow circle members. She'd like to make other people happy with her music.

"Uwawa~! ☆ Isn’t that just wonderful?!"
―Ootori Emu

Ootori Emu (鳳えむ)  is a first-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's part of the musical show unit "Wonderlands x Showtime."

Emu is very cheerful but also a bit naive. She's impulsive, acting on every idea that she comes up with. She often drags people around her into her plans.

"Fufufu, I’m getting so many Likes. However…"
―Shinonome Ena

Shinonome Ena (東雲絵名) is a second-year at Kamiyama High School, but she only attends part-time night classes. She's the illustrator of the underground music circle 25-ji, Night Chord de going by the alias "Enan".

Ena is a strong-willed girl. When she draws she lives in her own world.

Shinonome Akito is her younger brother. She doesn't seem to pay attention to Akito since she focuses on chatting online and never talks about him to her online friends. 
Ena shares the same food likes and dislikes with her brother, Akito. She gets annoyed when Mizuki mentions this in her introduction video.

Ena is grateful that Yoisaki Kanade saw worth in her illustrations which made her jealous that Kanade trusts her fellow circle member Asahina Mafuyu so much.

"Why am I surrounded by weirdos?"
―Kusanagi Nene

Kusanagi Nene (草薙寧々) is a first-year student at Kamiyama High School. She's part of the musical show unit "Wonderlands x Showtime."

Nene and Kamishiro Rui are next-door neighbors and childhood friends. Rui was the one who recommended her to join the troupe. She's a great singer and dreams of singing on stage for a musical, however, she doesn't appear on stage. Instead, she operates her Nene-Robo and performs through it.

"This man is destined to be a star!"
―Tenma Tsukasa

Tenma Tsukasa (天馬司) is a second-year student at Kamiyama High School. He's part of the musical show unit "Wonderlands x Showtime".

Tsukasa is very confident. He often shows off and has a tendency to get caught up in the moment. He's also a reliable older brother towards Saki, often taking care of her.

"I’m the very definition of half-baked…"
― Aoyagi Touya

Aoyagi Touya (青柳冬弥) is a first-year student at Kamiyama High School. He's part of the street music group "Vivid BAD SQUAD."

He is silent and calm but has a strong mind. He has trouble communicating with someone else besides Akito. Usually, Touya gets misunderstood when he talks to someone else. He also has an extraordinary sense of music due to being educated from a very young age.

Touya is good at crane games to the point he's having difficulty with sorting the stuffs he obtained through it.

"Is this truly the idol life that I dreamed of…?"
―Hinomori Shizuku

Hinomori Shizuku (日野森雫) is a second-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's part of the idol group "MORE MORE JUMP!"

Shizuku is a member of the idol group Cheerful＊Days. She trained to become an idol at the same time as Airi Momoi. She's best known among fans for her mysterious and mature appearance, however, this causes jealousy from the other group members.

"Let’s do our very, very, veeeery best!"
―Hanasato Minori 

Hanasato Minori (花里みのり) is a first-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's part of the idol group "MORE MORE JUMP!"

Minori is a big fan of Kiritani Haruka of the idol group ASRUN. Like her longtime idol, Minori also wants to become an idol. She tried her hand at multiple auditions but has failed every time. Despite this, she never gives up and continues to try to achieve her dreams. She is a hard-working and innocent-minded girl although she is bad at staying calm.

"I want to try something that the four of us can do together!"
―Tenma Saki

Tenma Saki (天馬咲希) is a first-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's the keyboardist of Leo/need.

She was born with a weak body. Because of her weak body, she could not attend middle school. Her older brother, Tsukasa, took care of her during that time. However, she became healthy enough to attend high school.

Saki is a cheerful mood-maker who never stops smiling. She wishes that she and her friends come together again.

Both Saki and her brother Tsukasa love theme parks and it's attractions. She often drags her bandmates to the Wonderlands x Showtime world, much to their displeasure.

"You can’t live life in fear of being hurt."
―Mochizuki Honami

Mochizuki Honami (望月穂波) is a first-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's the drummer of Leo/need.

Honami is smart, athletic, and kind. She's said to be nice towards everyone and always takes their feelings into consideration, deeply caring for them. However, this can lead her to be indecisive and has difficulty expressing her own feelings. 

She doesn't want others to worry about her and tends to get emotional very easily. Despite this, she's always supportive of her friends, thinking of them very often. She's also known for having her head in the clouds, often thinking of apple pie.

"Being an idol is not all that it’s cracked up to be…"
―Kiritani Haruka

Kiritani Haruka (桐谷遥) is a first-year student at Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy. She's part of the idol group "MORE MORE JUMP!"

Haruka is very charismatic. She's the most popular member of the former idol group, ASRUN. Airi describes her as cheeky but weak.

posts.content: After a lot of thought, I decided to take a look at the other functions. Both Te and Se describe it better than Si and Te. I don't rule out many possibilities that she is an INFP (and I will continue to say that she is an XNFP). But if i answer without ****, then she is ENFP//
shes such a cutie. my fav character !!

I don't know about the type, but-
I really rarely like such characters, but she's like the sun or orange colour, so bright and cute🧡✨
